dict.acceptation: 瞬间，片刻；时刻；重要，紧要；[物]力矩；

sent.orig: A moment is a few seconds.
The truncated moment, infinite moment and inequality moment problems are discussed using the theory of matrices.
sent.trans: 本文利用矩阵论的方法讨论截断矩问题，无穷矩问题以及带不等号的矩问题。

sent.orig: This is an exciting moment; this is an expecting moment; and this is an inspiring moment.
sent.trans: 这是一个激动人心的时刻，这是一个万众瞩目的时刻，这也是一个催人奋进的时刻！

sent.orig: Just a moment, please. The cashier will have your bill ready in a moment.
sent.trans: 请稍等，收银员马上会准备好您的账单。

sent.orig: That struggle is a moment-to-moment decision-to learn to open or close one's mind.
sent.trans: 因此，人们需要不停地与自己作斗争：是通过学习打开自己的心扉，还是封闭自己的头脑。
